job.title: Machine Learning Engineer
job.description: pFounded in 2016 Windfall Data is on a mission to determine the net worth of everyone on the planet The company helps nonprofit and forprofit organizations to more effectively identify understand and engage affluent consumers with the industrys most reliable and accurate dataset available More than 750 organizations use Windfall Data to identify and engage their most promising constituents As a company we are growing quickly and every member of our team has a tangible impact on the success of our business and our customersppbrppAt Windfall data emisem our product  and our machine learning models lie at the heart of everything we do We are looking for an experienced machine learning engineer who is able to design and build out stable infrastructure to support our production models in collaboration with our team of data scientistsppbrppstrongResponsibilitiesstrongpulliPropose and implement a scalable ML modeling workflow for standardized use by our data
